import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import DayOneBG from'../../../Img/Home_BGImg.png' import DayTwoBG from '../../../Img/Home_BGImg2.png' import BGImg3 from '../../../Img/Home_BGImg3.png' import Num01 from '../../../Img/Home_NumTitle_1.png' import Num02 from '../../../Img/Home_NumTitle_2.png' import HomeImg1 from '../../../Img/Home_1.png' import HomeImg2 from '../../../Img/Home_2.png' import CustomLink from '../../../Global/CustomLink' const Section1 = () => { return ( <> {/* 第一段喔 */}

◇ 比賽資訊 ◇

{/* 初賽比賽資訊 */}
{/* 背景圖 */}
{/* 左字 */}
{/*01大字圖*/}
{/*第一行*/}

初賽

{/*第二行*/}

11/18 - 11/19 國立臺北科技大學中正館中正廳

{/* 右圖 */}
{/* 決賽比賽資訊 */}

) } export default Section1
